ModMetaData.name: Bo's Milkable Animals
ModMetaData.author: Bo
ModMetaData.description:
Makes deer, gazelles, ibexes, alpacas, muffalo, bison, horses, donkeys, and sheep milkable.
This simple mod uses PatchOperations, maximizing compatibility with other mods. I recommend placing this mod at/near the bottom of your load order, but nothing bad will happen if you don't. This mod is save-safe and can be added/removed to new or existing games as you please. Don't worry if I forget to update this mod and it's listed as out-of-date. This mod is very simple, if I died yesterday this mod will most likely still work far into the future.
Supports Rimworld Versions 1.0 to 1.4+
